name: House Of Memories
description:
A man pursued by nightmares from the past must revisit the place where everything started and discover the origin that made everything fell apart

Game submission for the Global Game Jam 2019.

current status: alpha version

Instructions (keyboard /game pad (Xbox controller layout)):

-) Move with the arrow keys or with the left joystick or D-pad

-)Interaction with objects is triggered with the E key or the button A 

-)Character swap is made with the Q and W keys or shoulder buttons
